attributes.action: release sufficient funds to allow the A64 to be completely dualled.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The A64 at the moment, by virtue of it's single lane sections, is having a potentially detremental effect on the economic and social benefits that could, and should, be enjoyed by the people who live along the Yorkshire coast.The effect of continual dualling will have unqauntifiable benefits to the economic business base of the coastal regions.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "release sufficient funds to allow the A64 to be completely dualled."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15113.asp

Prime Minister's Office
